title: Iron Man
plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: The Incredible Hulk
plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

title: Iron Man 2
plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful madman with ties to his father's legacy.

title: Thor
plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'.

title: The Avengers
plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Ant-Man
plot: Scott Lang, a petty thief, must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa, the king of Wakanda, must step forward to take the throne and defend his country from an old foe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help to erase his identity as Spider-Man from the minds of everyone, but the spell goes wrong, leading to the arrival of villains from other universes.

title: Doctor Strange
plot: After a car accident robs him of the use of his hands, brilliant but arrogant surgeon Stephen Strange must learn the mystic arts to heal himself and protect the world from mystical threats.

title: Captain Marvel
plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
plot: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed combat, is drawn into the clandestine Ten Rings organization and must confront his past.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
plot: Thor embarks on a journey of self-discovery and faces Gorr the God Butcher, who seeks to make the gods extinct.

title: Eternals
plot: The Eternals, an immortal alien race, emerge from hiding to protect humanity from the Deviants, their ancient adversaries.

title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
plot: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside the Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
plot: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe, but his plans are interrupted when he has to step up as Spider-Man to confront the mysterious Mysterio.

title: WandaVision
plot: Wanda Maximoff and Vision, two superpowered beings, live suburban lives that start to unravel in a mysterious and evolving TV show world.

title: Loki
plot: Loki, the God of Mischief, is arrested by the Time Variance Authority and must navigate a complex multiverse while dealing with his own identity issues.

title: The Marvels
plot: Carol Danvers, Kamala Khan, and Monica Rambeau's powers become entangled, leading them to work together to save the universe.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
plot: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's parentage.

title: Black Widow
plot: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

title: What If...?
plot: An animated series that explores alternate realities and the question of 'What If?' major moments in the MCU had happened differently.

title: Hawkeye
plot: Clint Barton teams up with young archer Kate Bishop to confront enemies from his past and ensure she has a future.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
plot: Teenager Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and meets other Spider-People from alternate dimensions to stop a threat that could destroy all realities.

title: Venom
plot: Journalist Eddie Brock becomes the host for an alien symbiote that gives him superpowers and transforms him into the antihero Venom.

title: Morbius
plot: Dr. Michael Morbius, a scientist with a rare blood disease, turns into a vampire-like creature with superhuman abilities after an experimental treatment goes wrong.

title: Blade: Trinity
plot: Blade teams up with two vampire hunters to stop the resurrection of Dracula and save humanity from a vampire apocalypse.

title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
plot: Johnny Blaze, the Ghost Rider, must save a young boy from the Devil, who wants to use him for a sinister purpose.
